alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 11:55AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lander and northwestern Eureka Counties through 1230 PM PDT... At 1154 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Grass Valley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Tenabo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
